sentences.english: Don't nibble, I don't want to quarrel with you now.
sentences.chinese: 别找碴儿，我今天可不想和你吵架。

sentences.english: Eg. I was attending to my business, but he picked a quarrel with me.
sentences.chinese: 我在专心干我的事，他却向我找碴儿吵架。

sentences.english: Once in a while she fastened a quarrel on her husband.
sentences.chinese: 她偶尔找碴儿跟丈夫吵架。

sentences.english: Most likely, some religious scholar had trailed him home to pick a fight.
sentences.chinese: 极有可能是有宗教学者上门找碴儿来了。
